attributes.action: Limit NHS COVID TREATMENT FOR ANTI-VAXXERS
attributes.additional_details: Members of the public have now had over 12 months to get vaccinated, those who choose not to receive it should not be prioritized over those with medical needs that are unavoidable. Anti-vaxxers are taking up beds and wards in hospitals that should be assigned to people who are unavoidablely in need of hospital treatment. Anti-vaxxers have already turned down free medication and should not be then retrospectively be able to claim treatment that causes detrimental effect on society's wellbeing
attributes.background: Exclude voluntary anti-vaxxers (not those with valid medical reasons) from free NHS care for COVID -19 treatment
